[[ABS-CBN]] (1986-1994)| | effective_radiated_power = 5 kilowatts| | HAAT = | | class = | | facility_id = | | coordinates = | | homepage = [http://www.igma.tv/ iGMA.tv]| }} '''DXLA-TV''', channel 9, is a television station of [[Philippines|Philippine]] [[television network]] [[GMA Network]]. Its studio is located at Brgy. Cabatangan, Zamboanga City. This is formerly owned by [[First United Broadcasting Corporation]] in 1990's. ==See also== *[[GMA Network]] *[[List of GMA Network affiliate stations]] *[[First United Broadcasting Corporation]]. {{Zamboanga TV Stations}} [[Category:GMA Network stations]] [[ceb:DXLA-TV]]
